Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 60h Indiana.
ShortDescription: Westbound 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near 60th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, Indiana, 59th including the normal route streets  due to street blockage near 60th/Indiana.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Brown and Purple Line Trains
ShortDescription: Brown and Purple Line trains are running with delays from congestion near Armitage. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown and Purple Line trains are running with delays from congestion after an earlier door problem on the train near Armitage

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed/correct the problem and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
